metadata.title: IBTOM CASTLE Mini Polka Dots Dress for Baby Girls Halloween Princess Birthday Party Costume Carnival Fancy Dress Up Playwear
features: ♥【Fancy Party Summer Fall Outfits】Elegant Ladybug princess fancy dresses for girls, kids girls fly sleeve round neck High-Low Embroidered Pleated dress evening party prom puffy tulle ball gown.polka dots flower girls junior bridesmaid wedding dress,first holy communion dresses Carnival Event birthday party fall dressing up clothes,Christmas Cocktail Ball Gowns,it will make your girl beautiful and feel like a princess fancy Dress up Costume,lovely and pretty design

♥【1st/2nd Dress Up Cosplay Costume】Teenagers junior bridesmaid wedding flower girl high low gowns,Slim fitted bodice, adorned with polka dot print, concealed back-zip fastener, the sashes are attached at the side seams can be tied a bowknot at back,Sleeveless style with a cute bowknot decor front waist, hi-lo tail design make your little fairy more pretty and lovely,got lots of compliments for her,this dress gives a sense of loveliness and sweetness, brings your girl both comfort and style

♥【Birthday Photo Shoot Costume】Fly Sleeve, pleated ruffle rims at front waist extend to the bottom, adds fullness to the dress, exquisite and charming, kids floor length maxi ball gown suitble for Wear Along for Summer, Pair with Cardigan, Coat, Petticoat, tights, Leggings for Spring, Autumn, Winter, sweetest, and best-dressed member of your wedding party is your girl, She will look Amazing in the One-Of-A-Kind Gown for Wedding, Confirmation Birthday Dress when walking down the aisle

♥【OCCATION】Princess dress style overall baby girls vintage dresses Christening baptism lovely birthday outfits Suitable for daily wear and special occasion like swirling, dancing, recital, etiquette class, concert, speech and all kind of party, wedding, banquet, church, school, formal, Easter, Halloween, Christmas, beachwear, rustic country, artist photography shoot, New Year, valentine’s day, thanksgiving day, graduation, Father Daughter Dance, Ceremony, Family Gathering, Playwear, Cocktail

♥【SELECT SIZE】Beautiful formal evening party dress Available for Age 1-11 Years Old, Please Refer to the Left Picture for our size chart before ordering, wonderful choice as Souvenir, Every kids will enjoy twirling in this dress. Let's create unforgettable memories with our cute Cartoon fancy outfits on your baby's first halloween! enhances the relationship between parents and children, adding more fun and interest to families, Receive many compliments
description: Condition: New With TagsPackage Include: 1PC DressMain Material: Polyester + Cotton BlendsFeatures: Sleeveless/Fly Sleeve, Round Neck/V Neck, Polka Dot, Bowknot, Back Zipper Closure, Ruffle Rim, High-Low TailGender: Flower Girls little big girl toddler infant baby little one princess sister kids child children Tag No.100: Recommended Size for Kids:18-24 Months; Chest:22.0" / 56cm; Waist:21.5 / 54cm; Shoulder:10.0" / 25cm; Front Length:21.5" / 55cm; Rear Length:25.5" / 65cm; Tag No.110: Recommended Size for Kids:2-3 Years; Chest:23.5" / 60cm; Waist:23.0" / 58cm; Shoulder:10.5" / 26cm; Front Length:23.5" / 60cm; Rear Length:27.5" / 70cm; Tag No.120: Recommended Size for Kids:4-5 Years; Chest:25.0" / 64cm; Waist:24.5" / 62cm; Shoulder:10.5" / 27cm; Front Length:25.5" / 65cm; Rear Length:29.5" / 75cm; Tag No.130: Recommended Size for Kids:6-7 Years; Chest:26.5" / 68cm; Waist:26.0" / 66cm; Shoulder:11.0" / 28cm; Front Length:27.5" / 70cm; Rear Length:31.5" / 80cm; Tag No.140: Recommended Size for Kids:8-9 Years; Chest:28.5" / 72cm; Waist:27.5" / 70cm; Shoulder:11.5" / 29cm; Front Length:29.5" / 75cm; Rear Length:33.5" / 85cm; Tag No.150: Recommended Size for Kids:10-11 Years; Chest:30.0" / 76cm; Waist:29.0" / 74cm; Shoulder:12.0" / 30cm; Front Length:31.5" / 80cm; Rear Length:35.5" / 90cm; Friendly Tips: We measure the size manually, please allow slight 1-3cm difference. The suggested size is just for your reference.Photo color might be a little different from the actual product due to color display of different monitors.Care Instructions: Hand wash in cold water, line dry, do not bleach and iron. Do not blow it with hair dryer.Please feel free to contact us if you have any question about our product, we will response you within 24 hours.
